Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Added support for extra document types." (#228) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Added support for extra document types.
Also reordered case statements to make it more easy to spot the different types.

Unfortunately i don't have any example documents to use for unit tests.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Accepting Revisions on a document that contains AlternativeFormatImportPart will remove the part" (#227) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi. I have this issue with any kind of document that contains altChunk element. Calling: OpenXmlPowerTools.RevisionAccepter.AcceptRevisions(wordDocument) on that document will remove all altChunk elements within the body of the document. I assume this is not supposed to happen, or am I wrong?
This is a simple version of a file on which this issue is happening:
[Test.docx](https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools/files/2090414/Test.docx)
and a scheenshot with the dom before:
![test](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15382360/41238189-9d92a646-6d95-11e8-8f3b-7f93cc501897.png)
And this is the document after calling AcceptRevisions:
[Test-accepted.docx](https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools/files/2090427/Test-accepted.docx)
with a screenshot of the dom:
![test-accepted](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15382360/41238247-c9bd16d4-6d95-11e8-97e3-c9c3c6e77eca.png)
